gen:link.msg:message: FATAL ERROR: In table [630-41] S0910 should be equal to S0907+S0908+S0909 with margin of error [1] {{abs([630-41:R9C10|RPC=Reporting period] ({$a}) - [630-41:R9C7|RPC=Reporting period] ({$b}) + [630-41:R9C8|RPC=Reporting period] ({$c}) + [630-41:R9C9|RPC=Reporting period] ({$d})) <= 1}}
